docs.lead_paragraph: THE scope of his hatreds, on and off the screen, was total and terrifying, taking in children, mothers, dogs, parvenu and proletarian, doctor and medicine man, city slicker and country bumpkin, the rich and the powerful, the insulted and injured, the fat, the lean, the flagrantly bearded, the fastidiously mustached,...

headline.main: The Dark Geography Of W.C. Fields; The Dark Geography of W.C. Fields After 1941, what was there left for him, and where was he to go?
